body:
I have a new map out called Knuckles and Broken Goggles. This has been played 5 times now, and some proper feedback would be nice. I already have a few changes set up for it, and i'd love for you to post what you think should be changed.

List of Revisions Planned
- Change the pressure plates; you get stuck in them too easy.
- Fix the inventory slots; they are disorganized and not proper.
- Create a sequel with Sulorak and Evocal (Fists and Broken Glasses)
- Change the lighting; remove night vision and make it more ambient.
- Add portals in the bathroom; going through a door in a bathroom will tp you to the other side's bathroom.
- Better spawn; right now it's a mess with a lot crammed into it.

title: Knuckles and Broken Goggles: Feedback

replies.body: Break blocks I know its TDM but still it would be nice.

replies.body: Evo got stuck in the Women's Bathroom and I had to get him out xD
